title: Citigroup CFO John Gerspach and Incoming CFO Mark Mason to Present at the 2019 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, and Mark Mason, Incoming CFO, will present at the 2019 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum on Tuesday, February 12, 2019. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 9:20 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
